Title: To Light a Candle.

Description: In a second installment of the series that began with The Outstretched Shadow, Knight-Mage Kellen becomes a member of the Elves' war councils and fears for the safety of his Wild Magic-wielding sister, while proud Elf Knight Jermayan continues his efforts to become the first Elven Mage.
